author: Hager Hu
contents: This is the content about circle app.
title: About Circle

author: Hager Hu
contents:
Total Privacy Circle does not have user analytics data or tracking data and does not have any ad plug-ins. Personal data related to the user is not uploaded to the server; only the channel relationship data used by the user is stored on the server.
Privacy Policy We take our customers’ privacy very seriously. Any data collected through the Circle app is governed by this policy. Use of Circle implies that you agree to the terms and conditions of this privacy policy.
title: Privacy Policy

author: Hager Hu
contents: Start use workout channel to list finished records.
title: Use Workout Channel to list workout records

author: Hager Hu
contents:
Contact Us We provid contact us entry in profile page. Welcome your any feedback. You can also click send us an email to contact us.
Keep Update Follow us on Twitter. We post updates for new release and event provide links for public beta versions, so you can test out new version before they go global. Twitter: @hagerhu
title: User Support
